description: "This late 17th century map of Asia is by William Berry, based on an earlier map by the French cartographer Nicolas Sanson. Dedicated to King Charles II, it features the royal coat of arms of the United Kingdom in its elaborate cartouche."
title: "Asia   divided   into   its   principall   regions   in   which   may   be   seen   the   extent   of   the   empires,   monarchies,   kingdoms   and   states   which   at   present   divide   Asia"
